question: Tyler was a pen pal with 13 people. He stopped being penpals with 3 of them. They each send 4 letters a week that are 10 pages long. He responds in kind. He can write a page every 10 minutes. How many hours does he spend writing a week?
answer:
Tyler is penpals with 13-3=<<13-3=10>>10 people
Thus he gets 10*4=<<10*4=40>>40 letters a week
So he writes 40*10=<<40*10=400>>400 pages a week
So he writes for 400*10=<<400*10=4000>>4000 minutes a week
So he writes 4000/60=<<4000/60=66>>66 hours a week
#### 66
